The user creates [[Multiple Shadow Clone Technique|several shadow clones]], which kick the opponent in succession, launching them into the air. Then, the user creates five thousand shadow clones, which, taking the form similar to that of the [[Fang Passing Fang]], strike the opponent from both sides. Finally, using their [[Nine-Tails]]' [[chakra]], the user, alongside their shadow clones, focus the chakra into their one hand and, with it, they strike the opponent together, creating an eruption of orange-coloured chakra, which can even be seen from space.
